response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value to you, valued at $1,500,000. I am offering this extraordinary item to you at a special price, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a chance to secure this valuable asset at a premium price compared to its market value, while also ensuring a substantial return for me. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we can proceed to finalize this transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
